pages.text: If you have many Upgrades in-place within a machine and you don't want to go through the hassle of relocating everything to an upgraded version, try an $(1)Upgrade Kit.$() When you SHIFT-RIGHT CLICK on a block, it will upgrade it, moving all items to their appropriate new slots.
The $(4)Electric Upgrade Kit$() will convert any Kinetic Machines (namely, the Kinetic Fluid Mixer and Grinder) into their Electric counterparts.

The $(9)MKII Upgrade Kit$() will convert any Electric Machines into their MKII counterparts, carrying over all upgrades. Additionally, any input or output will be placed in the FIRST processing bank of the MKII Machine.
